I am grateful for the life lessons UBM has taught me - how NOT to treat people and run a business. It's made me a better and stronger person/leader. A successful business, is a lot like life, you're judged by the impact and legacy you have on others ---not what you say you do, but on the actions you take. If you want to be successful, take care and respect my fellow colleagues and the great team I left behind.
